channel.title: Open Source on Oliver Dawson
channel.description: Recent content in Open Source on Oliver Dawson

item.title: Advanced Guide to Linux-Based Cyber Forensics
item.description: Advanced Digital Forensics Guide (Disk Imaging to File Carving) This guide outlines professional forensic workflows using open-source tools on Linux. It covers: Disk imaging and hashing Cold system analysis FAT32 and ext file system analysis File carving and recovery Each section includes practical checklists, command-line examples, and links to official tools and references. Designed for analysts and practitioners. Disk Imaging and Acquisition (Forensically Sound) Objectives Create exact bit-by-bit images of target storage media.
